reasons.externalText: Sold my company, or going out of business
Didn't hire as intended, or laid off employees

rebuttalData.title: Pause for $9/month
rebuttalData.text: If you plan to hire more employees in the future, it's recommended that you have the right HR policies and compliance in place before they begin. Would you like to switch to our Pause Plan for only $9 per month, so you're ready to go when you hire again and avoid paying another setup fee?
rebuttalData.acceptanceText: Thank you! We'll switch you to the Pause Plan for $9/month, and you can reactivate your regular plan at any time. Our Customer Experience Team will email you within one business day to confirm the switch. Have a great day!

reasons.externalText: Admin that purchased Bambee left the company
Cutting HR budget, I'm going to manage HR myself

rebuttalData.title: Don't put yourself at risk
rebuttalData.text: The average lawsuit costs $600,000, and the best way to avoid this is through proper HR and insurance. Would you like to speak with our Customer Experience team about how we can demonstrate the ROI you need to continue with Bambee?
rebuttalData.acceptanceText: Thank you! Our Customer Experience Team will reach out to you within one business day, and we've placed your subscription on hold until we're able to get this resolved for you. We appreciate you giving us a chance to make this right!

reasons.externalText: Starting to need an internal HR manager
Sold Company

Wanted more hands-on approach from HRM, or I wanted to be less involved
Wanted HR consulting only and no software
Software doesn't have the right features
Not converting 1099 Contractors to employees
HR Team doesn't respond quickly enough

rebuttalData.title: Want a new HR Manager?
rebuttalData.text: We have a large team of HR Managers, and we're happy to transfer you to a new one if you're not satisfied with the performance you've been seeing. Would you like to speak with our Customer Experience team about getting a new HR Manager?
rebuttalData.acceptanceText: Thank you! We'll reach out to you within one business day to make sure we get you to the right HR Manager to address your concerns, and we've placed your subscription on hold until we're able to get this resolved for you. We appreciate you giving us a chance to make this right!

reasons.externalText: Policies or documents take too long

rebuttalData.title: Need quicker policies?
rebuttalData.text: We offer different levels of customization on the policies we prepare, and in most cases we should be able to deliver the documents you need within a few business days. Would you like to speak with our Customer Experience team to see how we can deliver those documents more quickly?
rebuttalData.acceptanceText: Thank you! We'll reach out within one business day to go over how we can speed up the policies and documents you need, and we've placed your subscription on hold until we're able to get this resolved for you. We appreciate you giving us a chance to make this right!
